name: Microsoft CSD-00001 Wireless Ergonomic Keyboard With Optical Mouse

Save time and access most used applications with one touch., 2.4 GHz Reliable Wireless, Microsoft 2.4 GHz wireless delivers a reliable connection with up to a 30-foot range, with virtually no interference., Compact Design with Quiet Touch Keys, Quiet, responsive,thin-profilekeys., 4-Way Scrolling, Scroll four ways for greater efficiency and comfort with Tilt Wheel Technology., Media Center, Control media playback from your keyboard.]
